name: uploadAPISpecification
description: Upload an API specification to ReadMe. Or, to use a newer solution see https://docs.readme.com/guides/docs/automatically-sync-api-specification-with-github

x-readme-version.description: Version number of your docs project, for example, v3.0. To see all valid versions for your docs project call https://docs.readme.com/developers/reference/version#getversions.
